title: Alimens & Gentle French Cuff Regular Fit Dress Shirts (Cufflink Included)
description: Elegant Fit, Timeless Elegance: The French cuff dress shirt is crafted with a classic fit that's perfect for any formal occasion，such as business events,weddings, galas, charity balls,dinner parties, cocktail hours,anniversaries, birthdays, holiday celebrations,company retreats,theater performances, art exhibitions,dating nights or everyday wear

Attention to Detail, Quality Embodied: The shirt features meticulous stitching at the collar and cuffs, ensuring that every detail is crafted to perfection. The French double cuff design, paired with cufflinks, exudes a gentleman's charm

Functional Pockets, Practical Convenience: The specially designed chest pocket not only adds a fashionable touch to the shirt but also provides additional storage space for small items, making it both stylish and practical

Easy Care, Long-lasting Freshness: The fabric of the shirt has undergone special treatment, offering superior wrinkle resistance, making it easy to clean and maintain. It stays crisp and fresh even after multiple wears and washes
Variety Styles Of Metal Cufflinks：The cufflinks are sent randomly and produced with best quality metal material
